Package net.srussell.framework.exception.handler

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExceptionHandler
    This interface describes the basic API for handling exceptions...the handle method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultHandler
    The default handler simply throws the exception as an ApplicationException.
    Handlers
    Handles is the business logic of handling exceptions.
    HandlersWrapper
    A static container for a single instance of Handlers
